commands: // Select the names and the prices of all the products in the store.
// Select the name of the products with a price less than or equal to $200.
// Select all the products with a price between $60 and $120.
// Select the name and price in cents (i.e., the price must be multiplied by 100).

files.products.csv: itemid,name,price,manid1,Hard drive,240,52,Memory,120,63,ZIP drive,150,44,Floppy disk,5,65,Monitor,240,16,DVD drive,180,27,CD drive,90,28,Printer,270,39,Toner cartridge,66,310,DVD burner,180,2
